instructions: In a skillet, cook the beef, onion, green pepper and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain.
Add the tomato juice, macaroni, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until macaroni is tender.
title: Hamburger Mac Skillet
steps: In a skillet, cook the beef, onion, green pepper and garlic over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain. Add the tomato juice, macaroni, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until macaroni is tender.
